name: Privacy
content: We don't store any user-identifiable data such as names, locations or passwords.
We don't store any images or have access to your device's photos.
We do store your email address when you are registered on the system. This helps secure your account.
We do store the type and version of your browser when you log in. This helps us make sure the site isn't being abused, and that it works properly on all browsers.
When choosing a user or team name, please don't use your real name, or anything private that you don't want other people to see.

name: Cookies
content: We use cookies to make this site work. We store your username, and a unique randomly-generated key - nothing more sinister than that.
If you don't allow cookies I'm afraid you won't be able to use this site.
We don't use tracking cookies, analaytics or anything like that.

name: Security
content: All traffic to this website uses HTTPS/SSL certificates. This means that your data is encrypted and secure.

name: Location
content: If you want to use the map, you can allow the web page to use your location to update the map. You don't have to.
